name: Dark FI
description:
Dark FI      

A dark age of destruction has begun, magic orbs have been stolen to control fire and ice and are being used to terrorize the villagers. There is a young hero who can face and defeat the person responsible for these atrocities with the use of magic from the elements.

Run, jump and run to avoid danger and use fire, ice and nature magic to destroy as many magic orbs as you can.

(This is an update from previous game Fury FI)

How toplay

Jump= Space Bar

Slide= Down Arrow / S key

Fire magic= Right Arrow / D key

Ice Magic=Left Arrow  / A key

Nature magic=  Left+Right Arrow / A + D keys (green bar must be full)

Float=Hold Space bar
